abstract: Wells Fargo plans to expand its securities business, pitting it against rivals like JPMorgan Chase and Citigroup, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Wells Fargo plans to expand its securities business, pitting it against rivals like JPMorgan Chase and Citigroup, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo plans to expand its securities business, a move that will pit it against rivals like JPMorgan Chase and Citigroup in the investment banking and capital markets business, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: Wells Fargo to Expand in Securities, Report Says
